articles.title: Most distant supernova: James Webb sees a star explode at cosmic dawn
articles.description: Scientists have detected the most distant supernova ever seen, exploding when the universe was less than a billion years old. articles.title: The deep ocean has a missing link and scientists finally found it
articles.description: Scientists have uncovered why big predators like sharks spend so much time in the ocean’s twilight zone. articles.title: Mini brains reveal clear brain signals of schizophrenia and bipolar disorder
articles.description: Tiny lab-grown brains are offering an unprecedented look at how schizophrenia and bipolar disorder disrupt neural activity. articles.title: Losing weight in midlife may have a hidden brain cost
articles.description: Weight loss restored healthy metabolism in both young and mid-aged mice, but the brain told a different story. articles.title: Why your vitamin D supplements might not be working
articles.description: A randomized trial from Vanderbilt-Ingram Cancer Center reveals that magnesium may be the missing key to keeping vitamin D levels in balance.
